def analyze_numbers(lst):
    lst.sort()
    n = len(lst)
    median = (lst[(n - 1) // 2] + lst[n // 2]) * 2
    num_even = sum((1 for x in lst if x % 2 == 0))
    num_odd = n - num_even
    return (median, num_even, num_odd)
